meaning: 1. Kitchen, cook 2. Maniac, otaku, enthusiastic fan
description: Meaning 2 is slang, used similarly to 「addict」 (pinyin: chú). Derived from Japanese slang 「chu」 (from chudoku - addiction). Refers to fans who are obsessed with specific works or content.

examples.translation: Original work purist (fan who only accepts the original work)
